body:
With the following command one gets the testnet onion seed node list from Bitnodes:
`dig +short txt testnet-seed.bitnodes.io | tr --delete '"'`
I tried with these in bitcoin.conf, instead the ones in contrib/seeds/nodes_test.txt.
```
addnode=ocasutxnvl4lwegq.onion
addnode=cu6octp6yo754wda.onion
addnode=lkiggf5esgs7d5z6.onion
addnode=rhcv7q2quqn74zlr.onion
addnode=nq7cak6pufzs2ou2.onion
addnode=nec4kn4ghql7p7an.onion
addnode=qlllezfaif5cscnx.onion
addnode=zmtr2di735ngxpcl.onion
addnode=4syvownyxejvqbzn.onion
```
But in the first ten minutes no connection. Then unexpected (in the mean time I did something other) one connection to `nkf5e6b7pl4jfd4a.onion`, which had not been added in bitcoin.conf but is listed in contrib/seeds/nodes_test.txt. At least that one is up.
